GalaxyDefenders

Class GalaxyDefendersWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.world.World<info.gridworld.actor.Actor>
      • info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld
        • GalaxyDefenders.GalaxyDefendersWorld

  • public class GalaxyDefendersWorld
extends info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld
    The GalaxyDefendersWorld class extends ActorWorld. This class contains helper methods for the functionality of the game. This includes overriding the keyPressed method from Gridworld, a contains method to determine if a grid is occupied by an actor, and a get method for the linkedlist containing the aliens.
    Version:
    May 25, 2015
    Author:
    Ben Liang, Andy Shen, Pavan Gollapalli, Period: 4, Assignment: GridworldFinal, Sources:

    • Method Detail

      • keyPressed

        public boolean keyPressed(java.lang.String description,
                 info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
        Controls the movement and the shooting abilities of the sprite based on the keys that are inputed by the player. For example, left and right arrow keys for movement and the space bar for shooting.
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class info.gridworld.world.World<info.gridworld.actor.Actor>
        Parameters:
        description - the string describing the key, in this format.
        loc - the selected location in the grid at the time the key was pressed
        Returns:
        true if the world consumes the key press, false if the GUI should consume it.
